scripts.rebuild: pnpm run clean && pnpm run build
scripts.build: pnpm --recursive --color run build && pnpm node ./scripts/copy-index.mjs && pnpm run build:assets
scripts.build:debug: pnpm run clean && pnpm --recursive --color run build:debug && pnpm node ./scripts/copy-index-dev.mjs && pnpm run build:assets
scripts.start:container: pnpm run build:assets && pnpm run migrate && pnpm run start
scripts.dev:staging: NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=3072 NODE_ENV=development pnpm run build && pnpm run start
scripts.lint: pnpm run lint:ts; pnpm run lint:rs
scripts.lint:ts: pnpm --filter !fedired-js --recursive run lint ; pnpm run format:ts
scripts.debug: pnpm run build:debug && pnpm run start
scripts.test: pnpm run test:rs && pnpm run test:rs:miri && pnpm run test:ts
scripts.format: pnpm run format:ts; pnpm run format:rs
scripts.clean-all: pnpm run clean && pnpm run clean-cargo && pnpm run clean-npm
